# GAIA Project - Copilot Instructions

This is the GAIA (AI for Ecological Balance & Sustainability) project workspace.

## Project Overview

A React + TypeScript dashboard for predicting and visualizing ecological balance metrics using AI.

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite with Rolldown (experimental)
- **Routing**: React Router DOM
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **Maps**: Leaflet + React Leaflet
- **Styling**: Modern CSS3

## Development Commands

- `npm run dev` - Start development server (port 5173)
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Project Structure

```
src/
├── pages/          # Route pages (Home, Sustainability, Predictions)
├── App.tsx         # Main app with routing
├── App.css         # Global styles
└── index.css       # Root styles
```

## Coding Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow React functional component patterns
- Use Framer Motion for animations
- Maintain green/blue color theme (#10b981, #3b82f6)
- Keep components clean and modular

## Future Features to Implement

1. Location input panel with dropdown (City/Region, Year)
2. Sustainability score card (0-100 scale, color-coded)
3. Charts (CO₂/AQI trends using Chart.js)
4. Risk alert box with rule-based warnings
5. Interactive map integration with Leaflet
6. ML model integration for predictions
